news.title: 纽约市长因雪仗事件与警方高层产生分歧
news.title0: A New York City snowball fight gone wrong leaves Mayor Mamdani at odds with police
news.content: 纽约一场雪仗中有人向警察投掷雪球致警员受伤，市长称不应起诉，引发警方高层强烈不满。
news.content0: What started as an innocent snowball fight during the New York City blizzard has, in fact, snowballed, landing Mayor Zohran Mamdani and the city's police leadership in a row.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 古巴边防部队击沉美籍快艇致4死6伤
news.title0: Cuba says it shot dead four people on US-registered speedboat
news.content: 古巴称一艘美国注册快艇进入其水域并向巡逻船开火，边防部队还击致4名古巴籍乘客死亡，6人受伤被拘。
news.content0: Four people shot dead by Cuban border guards in a US-registered speedboat were Cuban nationals living in the United States, Cuba's government said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 视频显示以军士兵射杀巴勒斯坦少年后任其流血致死
news.title0: Israeli soldiers shot a Palestinian boy and stood around as he bled to death, video shows
news.content: 视频显示一名14岁巴勒斯坦少年被以军近距离射伤后，士兵围住他并阻止救护车接近，少年最终流血身亡。
news.content0: This story contains details and video that some readers may find distressing.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美伊在日内瓦举行关键会谈以避免冲突
news.title0: US and Iran begin talks seen as crucial to prevent conflict
news.content: 美伊官员在日内瓦举行第三轮间接会谈，被视为避免冲突的关键。特朗普威胁若无法达成核协议将打击伊朗。
news.content0: US and Iranian officials are meeting in Geneva for a third round of indirect talks seen as crucial to averting conflict, with President Donald Trump threatening to strike Iran if a nuclear deal is not reached.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 墨西哥毒枭内斗致城市沦为战区
news.title0: 'Fear is everywhere': BBC reports from Mexican city turned into war zone by drug cartel feud
news.content: 墨西哥锡那罗亚贩毒集团内斗导致库利亚坎市暴力激增，城市沦为战区，平民生活于恐惧之中。
news.content0: Mexico's president has praised the special forces for "bringing down" the country's most wanted man, drug lord Nemesio Oseguera Cervantes.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 匈牙利总理指责乌克兰实施“石油封锁”
news.title0: Orban steps up oil accusations against Ukraine after vetoing EU loan to Kyiv
news.content: 匈牙利总理欧尔班指责乌克兰故意中断“友谊”输油管道，对匈实施“石油封锁”，并已派兵保护关键能源设施。
news.content0: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban says he has stationed soldiers at key energy facilities across the country after he blamed Ukraine for disrupting energy supplies.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 加拿大财长称美国不大可能取消关税
news.title0: Canada's finance minister says US is unlikely to lift tariffs
news.content: 加拿大财长称，支付一定关税可能是进入美国市场的“代价”，暗示美国不大可能取消对加关税。
news.content0: A baseline tariff may be the "price" Canada has to pay to continue shipping goods to the US, Canada's finance minister said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 澳总理为称性侵幸存者“难相处”道歉
news.title0: Australian PM apologises after calling child sex abuse survivor and advocate 'difficult'
news.content: 澳大利亚总理阿尔巴尼斯在词语联想游戏中称性侵幸存者、前年度人物格雷斯·泰姆“难相处”，引发争议后道歉。
news.content0: Australia's prime minister has apologised for calling a former Australian of the Year and sexual abuse survivor "difficult", saying it was only in reference to the hardships she has faced.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 金正恩称若美尊重朝核地位两国可“相处”
news.title0: North Korea could 'get along' with US, says Kim Jong Un
news.content: 朝鲜领导人金正恩表示，若美国尊重朝鲜的核国家地位并放弃敌对政策，朝美两国可以“相处良好”。
news.content0: Kim Jong Un has declared his intent to expand North Korea's nuclear arsenal and operational range - calling on the United States to respect his country's nuclear power, in a rare message to Washington.
news.author: BBC
